Name: Lost Harem
About the game: Lost Harem - erotic game about finding your harem, with elements of adventure and survival. A businessman, owner of a brothel, a personal harem and just a male named Vlad, finds himself alone in the whole neighborhood. It was all the fault of the accident at the chemical laboratory. Taking the girls with you, you try to leave the infected zone, but you meet a wolf-like creature with which you engage in a fight, and you order the girls to flee to the nearest settlement. To save the girls, you have to go through hunger, thirst and chemical winds. Spend the night in the huts that you meet on your way, explore the area and find all the items you need to restore and repair the car. And in the end, get gratitude for having the opportunity to have sexual intercourse with each of the girls.
